name: Card Strike
description:
The goal is to play more cards than the computer. Cards come in 4 colors and are numbered 1 through 9.

Rules for playing cards:

  • A number 1 of any color can be played on any blank spot
  • When a spot has a card on it, only a card of the same color and 1 number higher can be played on it
  • For example, red 1 can only have red 2 played on it, blue 7 can only have blue 8 played on it

Press space to cycle to a new card if you can't play your current one. The game ends when 4 spots have gotten all the way to 9. There are no turns, so play as fast as you can!

If the computer plays where you wanted to play, you have a second chance! If you click that spot quickly enough, your card will replace the computer's.

Based on the classic card game Dutch Blitz.
